tweet.text: After months of fruitless efforts to negotiate the release of the U.S. hostages in Iran, President Carter approved a rescue mission to free them. Read the NSC discussion and his decision to launch the rescue attempt in #FRUS: https://t.co/AiQypLzCb0 https://t.co/8iSO2s5O06
